original_text: And now, O Lord, let the word that you have spoken concerning your servant and concerning his house be established forever, and do as you have spoken,
korean_text: 여호와여 이제 주의 종과 그의 집에 대하여 말씀하신 것을 영원히 견고하게 하시며 말씀하신 대로 행하사

sentences.original_text: let the word be established forever,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 말씀이 영원히 굳게 서게 하옵시고,

sentences.original_text: that you have spoken concerning your servant,
and do as you have spoken,
